Description.Text: Location The hotel is located in the heart of Barrio Norte, facing one of the most beautiful squares in Buenos Aires, Plaza Rodriguez Peña. The excellent location of the hotel offers guests immediate access to the exclusive neighbourhood of Recoleta and Calle Florida (around 5 minutes), to nearby restaurants in Avenida Santa Fe, as well as to the financial district, various shopping areas of the city and the domestic and international airports. The hotel is 1 km from the nearest bus station, 10 Facilities The hotel features 28 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. The upper floors are easily accessible using the lift. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a breakfast room and a bar. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Additional services include room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. A microwave and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. Internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access are provided as standard. Some of the accommodation units are wheelchair-accessible. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers an indoor pool. Guests can recline in the luxurious hot tub and be massaged by the hydro jets. Leisure options at the hotel include golf, a gym, a spa, a sauna, massage treatments and hydrotherapy, or for a fee, gymnastics. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA, Diners Club and MasterCard.
